alert.note: Alert for Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 9:41PM PST until January 17 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation possible. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to three tenths of an inch possible. * WHERE...In Oregon, Lower Columbia and Greater Portland Metro Area. In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County and Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Greater Portland Metro Area; Lower Columbia
